remarks: The predicate "is an orthomodular lattice."  (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2011.)
statement:
isoml.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
isoml.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
isoml.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
isoml.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
isoml.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
isoml $p |- ( K e. OML <-> ( K e. OL /\ A. x e. B A. y e. B ( x .<_ y -> y = ( x .\/ ( y ./\ ( ._|_ ` x ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d K x y $.
